Class PagedQueryResult

PagedQueryResult
public class PagedQueryResult

Class PagedQueryResult wraps around a QueryResult to allow access to only part of a query result.

This class is an implementation detail of class PagedQuery, and is not meant to be used on its own.

This class behaves just like class QueryResult. For more information on processing rows in query results, please examine the documentation for that class.

See Also:
PagedQuery, QueryResult

Parameters:
$queryResult - the QueryResult wrapped by this object
$offset - the index of the first row
$total - the number of rows on a single page
